item.title: Download coursera courses
item.author: Shoaib Bakhtyar
item.description: With this tip you can download courses from Coursera . . . Recently, I found some interesting courses that I wanted to study and I got enrolled in these. However, due to a busy schedule and lack of free time, I was not able to complete the courses in time. Then I thought how wonderful it will be if I can bulk download these courses and can study whenever I get free time.
